short_summary: VIA Rail wishes to prequalify several suppliers specializing in the development & delivery of training sessions
description: VIA Rail wishes to prequalify several suppliers specializing in the development & delivery of training sessions, that offer content libraries or catalogues and
full_summary:
=================
### Corporate Training Services Tender

#### Notice Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: MX-42802372782
* **Tender Solicitation Number**: 202212001
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-06
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-17T14:00:00
* **Notice URL**: <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2542963103/abstract?language=EN>

#### Tender Description

VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking to prequalify several suppliers specializing in corporate training services. The selected suppliers will be responsible for developing and delivering training sessions, offering content libraries or catalogues, and providing learning strategy consulting. The objective is to provide VIA Rail employees with a range of professional development solutions.

#### Services Required

* Development and delivery of training sessions
* Offer content libraries or catalogues
* Learning strategy consulting

#### Tender Location and Documents

The tender notice and associated documents are available on the Merx website (<http://www.merx.com>).
Fees may apply; see <https://www.merx.com/public/pricing> for more information.

#### Contact Information

For more information or to submit a tender, please contact:

* Jean-François Daviault
* Phone: 514-871-6702
* Email: [soumissions_tenders@viarail.ca](mailto:soumissions_tenders@viarail.ca)

#### Trade Agreements

The contract will be in accordance with the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

Please note that this tender has expired. The new tender reference number will be used for any future opportunities.
